name: Open
text: Nice Movie, great direction by Terrence Malick

name: Amira Gupta
text: I was left in awe of the sheer brilliance of it all. It's a movie I'll want to watch again and again. The movie was a true cinematic gem.

name: Jivin Bhagat
text: The movie was an emotional rollercoaster.

name: Amira Hans
text: It's a movie I'll want to watch again and again.
